definitions.title: Pt.
definitions.body: dry, dried, so, ms. abs. Na 1:10 + 4 t.; fs. [[יְבֵשָׁה]] Nu 11:6; mpl. [[יבֵשִׁים]]([[וִ]]) Nu 6:3; fpl. [[יְבֵשׁוֹת]] Ez Eze 37:2, Eze 37:4; —

dried, lit. only [[יֲנׇבִי ְיְבֵשִׁיס]] Nu 6:3 dried grapes (P; opp. [[לַתִים]] ´[[ְ]]); fig. [[נַפְשֵׁנוּ יְבֵשָׁה]] Nu 11:6 (JE) our soul (i.e. our appetite) is dried up, viz. for want of fresh, juicy meat.

dry, of chaff, [[קַשׁ]] Na 1:10 in sim. of Ninevites under impending judgment; cf. in fig. of Job, Job 13:25; of tree Ez Eze 17:24 (fig. of Davidic house; opp. [[עֵץ לָָךְ]]), Eze 21:3 (in prediction of Judah's devastation by Babylon, opp. id.); Is Is 56:3 fig. of eunuch; of the bones in Ezek.'s vision Ez Eze 37:2, Eze 37:4.
